explanation: The Sun represents vitality and energy. It is the center of our solar system.
The Moon symbolizes emotions and intuition. It has a significant influence on tides.
Mars embodies passion and determination. It is often called the 'Red Planet'.
Mercury represents communication and intellect. It is the closest planet to the Sun.
Jupiter symbolizes expansion and abundance. It is the largest planet in our solar system.
Venus embodies love and beauty. It is often referred to as the 'Evening Star'.
Saturn represents discipline and responsibility. It is known for its iconic rings.
